newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela Jan car sales up 119 pct versus year ago.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela Jan car sales up 119 pct versus year ago.

text.p: Vehicle sales in Venezuela rose 119 percent in January to 6,638 units, up from 3,036 in the same month a year ago, Venezuela's Automobile Chamber (Cavenez) said.
The increase continued a two-month old trend indicating that Venezuela's car market is out of a long slump.
Sales in January dropped 22.34 percent compared to December but analysts said that was a seasonal factor.
Of the total vehicles sold last month, 1,005 were imported.
Last year, vehicle sales in Venezuela dropped 23 percent to 61,602 from 80,391 in 1995, according to Cavenez figures.
